***The maximum file upload size is: 50Mb***

The following file formats are supported for the uploading your bulk expression profiles: **csv**, **tsv**, **xlsx**.

All uploaded data should have samples in columns and genes in rows. The first column should be in string/character format and contain gene symbols:

<br/>
<image src= "example_input.png" width = "100%"/>
<br/><br/>

Uploaded data should be <b>raw, untransformed, gene expression counts</b> because the data is transformed by GBMPurity prior to inference.
